title: Democracy Now! 2022-11-01 Tuesday
description:
The majority-conservative Supreme Court appears poised to strike down affirmative action in college admissions; Israel votes in its fifth national elections in four years amid increasing violence against Palestinians in the occupied West Bank; New York pays millions for wrongfully convicting two men for the assassination of Malcolm X.
